name: Symetricks
description:
Made for a jam where the theme was "Connection" and the restriction was "Multi Control"

Symetricks is a puzzle game where you play two buffers at the same time. The left one will move according to your inputs, the right one will move in the opposite direction.

The goal is simple : reproduce the shape on the superior screen before the countdown is finished by moving the two buffers at the same time !

The current prototype has 7 levels, a menu and a pause menu, a remind about controls and a level selection menu.

There is some sounds and a music, but there is no options to edit it.

Controls :

Z, Q, S, D or Up, Down, Right, Left => Move

SpaceBar => Switch the color of the buffers

Escape, P => Pause the game
